short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Developer Tools extension for debugging Casium state and messages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Development tools for inspecting, interacting with and debugging Casium applications. To use, load a Casium application, open Chrome Dev Tools, and navigate to the 'Casium' tab.
